data.title: North Augusta SC funeral home and cremation Aiken SC funeral home and cremation Edgefield SC funeral home and cremation
data.meta_description: All Obituaries - G. L. Brightharp & Sons Mortuary offers a variety of funeral services, from traditional funerals to competitively priced cremations, serving North Augusta, SC, Aiken, SC, Edgefield, SC and the surrounding communities. We also offer funeral pre-planning and carry a wide selection of caskets, vaults, urns and burial containers.
